text: In addition to the requirements of §§ 4-754.21, 4-754.22, 4-754.23, and 4-754.24, all providers of transitional housing shall provide:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-35, see notes following § 4-751.01.

DC CODE § 4-754.25

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Follow-up supportive services, for a minimum of 6 months, for clients who have transferred to permanent housing from their program, unless the client is receiving such supportive services from another provider;
An apartment-style or group home housing accommodation; and
Access to private space and personal time.

chapter.text: Services for Homeless Individuals and Families.

subchapter.text: Provision of Services for Homeless Individuals and Families.

heading.catch_text: Additional standards for providers of transitional housing.
